docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The crash of a United Airlines jumbo jet last week, its effect magnified by videotaped images and the accounts of those who lived through it, will leave psychic wounds on survivors, the families of the dead and the living, and even on ''vicarious victims'' far from the wreckage, mental health experts say.

headline.main: Emotional Scars From Iowa Crash Will Extend Beyond Survivors

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The nation's soaring rate of Caesarean deliveries is coming under increasing scrutiny as researchers report that perhaps half these procedures needlessly risk the mother's life or health without benefit to the baby.
docs.snippet: LEAD: The nation's soaring rate of Caesarean deliveries is coming under increasing scrutiny as researchers report that perhaps half these procedures needlessly risk the mother's life or health without benefit to the baby.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Seven years after the Latin American debt crisis erupted here, Mexico is a country battered by debt-induced austerity, in which the $100 billion owed to foreign creditors is likely to remain the dominant factor in the nation's economic and political life despite the new debt accord.

headline.main: Mexico Feels Squeeze of Years of Austerity
